ioc.detail2: It is available for computers based on the latest Intel® Core™ processors that are fingerprint enabled. Learn more about Intel Online Connect in Tips and Tricks.

av.defender-header-description: You are currently being protected by Windows Defender. However you could be better protected with Mcafee LiveSafe. Learn more below or activate Mcafee LiveSafe now.
